faq.question: 1. Knowledge Enchantment and the Aion Powerbook
faq.answer: Knowledge Enchantment and Aion Powerbook provide quick answers to player questions. You can share information with other players or submit questions in Knowledge Enchantment, Access detailed information about the game in the Aion Powerbook. Press the Knowledge Enchantment or Aion Powerbook button on the 1:1 Petition tab of the 1:1 Petition window to open the relevant webpage instantly. Pressing the button while in the Full Screen mode automatically changes the screen mode to Window Full Screen mode.

faq.question: 2. Entering Additional Information
faq.answer: When you are writing a petition for 1:1 Petition, make sure to enter the subject, content of petition and any additional information in full detail. In particular, please fill out any fields marked with an asterisk (*). It will help the GM to accurately assess your petition and respond to the problem as soon as possible. Serious problems that disrupt gameplay, such as immobilization or game shutdowns, are given the highest priority.
